author: StarTalk
description:
Should we resist getting old? Neil deGrasse Tyson and Chuck Nice discuss getting older, the meaning of death, and the value of wisdom. How do you plan to age gracefully? 

Timestamps: 
00:00 - Introduction: Getting Older
01:18 - Reliving the Glory Days
04:45 - Learning Every Day
10:41 - The Meaning of Death
12:48 - A Proverb

About StarTalk: 
Science meets pop culture on StarTalk! Astrophysicist & Hayden Planetarium director Neil deGrasse Tyson, his comic co-hosts, guest celebrities & scientists discuss astronomy, physics, and everything else about life in the universe. Keep Looking Up!

title: Neil deGrasse Tyson Reflects on Getting Older
